::DarkMouse::

She kept a strong eye on the maximals.  She couldn't understand why 
they all wanted to have a peace all of a sudden.  She had always 
thought that with this many maximals and predacons in such close 
quarters, they would have an all out fight. But yet, no one fired a 
single shot.  This whole situation made her very nervous.  She looked 
up at Destructor.  He had said he would help protect her, but had the 
classic question running through her mind.  If he's protecting her, 
who's protecting him?



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Magnus nodded. I know but it is the best we can do. Also ask your 
leader if 
> he isinterested in this peace between these factions." he walked 
over to the 
> ash that once was the ark. He looked for any salvagable material.
